Posts.Content: Ag1022 wrote: mammogram showed new faint cluster of microcalcifications. Went back for second screening bi rads. Findings breast composition is scattered fibroglandular densities. Right outer breast 8 mm from nipple there is a faint cluster of fairly punctate calcifications. No associated density seen. Suspicious abnormality.. Scheduled for biopsy tomorrow. Strong family history..can anyone explain what this all means? Please help Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Faint cluster microcalcifications Ag1022 Moderators
